long_description: The REI Revelcloud men's vest stuffs into your pack and offers lightweight, breathable core warmth for chilly days on the trail. Wear it over a fleece or underneath a shell for just-right protection. Revelcloud blocks winds up to 50 mph and the Durable Water Repellent finish fends off light rain showers, snow and stains. Pertex(TM) Quantum recycled fabric and a soft lining create an incredibly lightweight, durable and packable jacket; contrast-color lining looks sharp. PrimaLoft(R) Eco synthetic microfiber insulation works a lot like down with low bulk and excellent packability, yet provides warmth even when wet. PrimaLoft Eco uses 50% recycled plastic bottles. Full-length front zipper features an internal draft flap; chin guard protects skin from zipper abrasion. Internal hem drawcord seals in warmth; armholes are trimmed with stretch binding. 2 zip handwarmer pockets and zip chest pocket with media port. REI Revelcloud jacket packs into its own interior lumbar pocket; use it for an emergency pillow. Active fit ensures freedom of motion.
short_description: The REI Revelcloud men's vest stuffs into your pack and offers lightweight, breathable core warmth for chilly days on the trail. Wear it over a fleece or underneath a shell for just-right protection.
